comment: The dimensional volume of a half-open interval intersected with a half-space, is less than or equal to the dimensional volume of the original half-open interval. Used in the last inequality of step (e) of Lemma 115B of [Fremlin1] p. 30. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 21-Nov-2020.)
